noData.title: Start Filling Thailand Entry Information
noData.description: You haven't filled any entry information yet. Click the button below to start, and we'll guide you through the entire process.

info.title: Malaysia Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Visa-free for 30 days for Chinese passport holders

visa.title: ‚úì Great News! Visa-Free Policy
items: Since December 1, 2023, Chinese passport visa-free for 30 days - spontaneous travel!
‚Ä¢ No visa application needed in advance
‚Ä¢ Valid for tourism, family visits, business purposes
‚Ä¢ New requirement: MDAC Digital Arrival Card must be submitted (submission time limit applies)

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Entry Information
items: ‚Ä¢ MDAC has strict time limit: Submit too early = rejected, too late = can't make it
‚Ä¢ Time calculation error-prone: Must calculate by Malaysia time, timezone issues cause mistakes
‚Ä¢ PIN code easy to lose: Must show PIN upon entry, can't find email or lost screenshot is troublesome
‚Ä¢ CAPTCHA recognition difficult: Alphanumeric code unclear, multiple wrong attempts may get locked
‚Ä¢ High accuracy requirement: Any error in passport, flight, accommodation may affect entry

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: Auto-tracks itinerary, reminds you at the perfect time
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Smart-fill MDAC, accurate information
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Enter once, we manage the entire process
‚Ä¢ PIN management: Auto-save PIN and confirmation email, quick display upon entry

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill in what you have and complete gradually

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport valid at least 6 months with blank pages
validPassport.details: Malaysia immigration requires your passport to remain valid >=6 months beyond your entry date. Renew before traveling if needed.

returnTicket.title: Return or onward ticket
returnTicket.details: Provide confirmed flight booking showing you will leave Malaysia within authorized stay period.

accommodation.title: Accommodation proof
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or local contact information
accommodation.details: Provide hotel reservation confirmation or detailed contact information of friends/relatives in Malaysia, including address and phone number.

sufficientFunds.title: Sufficient funds
sufficientFunds.description: Cash, credit cards, or bank statements
sufficientFunds.details: Recommended to carry sufficient cash or show credit card/bank statements to prove adequate funds for your stay.

success.title: Great! You can proceed.
success.subtitle: Next we will confirm your travel information.

warning.title: Please review each item
warning.subtitle: Ensure you meet the MDAC prerequisites before continuing.

info.title: Singapore Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Visa-free for 30 days for Chinese passport holders

visa.title: ‚úì Great News! Visa-Free Policy
items: Since February 9, 2024, Chinese passport visa-free for 30 days - spontaneous travel!
‚Ä¢ No visa application needed in advance
‚Ä¢ Valid for tourism, family visits, business purposes
‚Ä¢ New requirement: SG Arrival Card must be submitted (submission time limit applies)

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Entry Information
items: ‚Ä¢ SG Arrival Card has time limit: Submit too early = invalid, too late = can't make it
‚Ä¢ Time calculation error-prone: Must calculate by Singapore time, timezone issues cause mistakes
‚Ä¢ Confirmation code easy to lose: Must show upon entry, can't find email is troublesome
‚Ä¢ High accuracy requirement: Any error in passport, flight, accommodation may affect entry
‚Ä¢ Immigration checks strict: Documents incomplete or answers unclear may trigger secondary inspection

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: Auto-tracks itinerary, reminds you at the perfect time
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Smart-fill SG Arrival Card, accurate information
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Enter once, we manage the entire process
‚Ä¢ Confirmation management: Auto-save confirmation code, quick display upon entry

info.continueButton: Got it, continue to the checklist

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill in what you have and complete gradually

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport should be valid 6+ months beyond arrival
validPassport.details: Singapore recommends at least 6 months validity. Renew or replace damaged passports before travel.

returnTicket.title: Return or onward ticket
returnTicket.details: Provide confirmed flight booking showing you will leave Singapore within authorized stay period.

accommodation.title: Accommodation proof
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or local contact information
accommodation.details: Provide hotel reservation confirmation or detailed contact information of friends/relatives in Singapore, including address and phone number.

sufficientFunds.title: Sufficient funds
sufficientFunds.description: Cash, credit cards, or bank statements
sufficientFunds.details: You may need to demonstrate sufficient funds for your stay. Bring cash, credit cards, or recent bank statements.

info.title: Hong Kong Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Visa-free for 7 days for Chinese passport holders

visa.title: ‚úì Great News! Visa-Free Policy
items: Chinese passport visa-free for 7 days - spontaneous travel!
‚Ä¢ No visa application needed in advance
‚Ä¢ Valid for tourism, business, family visits
‚Ä¢ Extensions can be applied through Hong Kong Immigration if needed

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Entry Information
items: ‚Ä¢ Short stay duration: Only 7 days, must leave on time or apply for extension
‚Ä¢ Immigration checks strict: May ask detailed questions about purpose, accommodation, funds
‚Ä¢ Document preparation required: Return ticket, hotel booking, funds proof all needed
‚Ä¢ Health declaration may required: Depending on current health policies
‚Ä¢ E-channels limited: First-time visitors must use manual counters, longer queues

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: Auto-reminds 7-day limit, no worries about overstay
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Pre-filled travel information, immigration questions prepared
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Enter once, all documents organized
‚Ä¢ Document checklist: Comprehensive preparation list, no missing items

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill in what you have and complete gradually

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport should be valid for at least 1 month beyond your stay
validPassport.details: Hong Kong requires your passport to be valid beyond your intended stay. Check expiry date and renew if necessary.

returnTicket.title: Return or onward ticket
returnTicket.description: Confirmed booking for departure from Hong Kong
returnTicket.details: Immigration may ask to see proof of your return flight or onward journey. Have your e-ticket or booking confirmation ready.

accommodation.title: Accommodation proof
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or host contact information
accommodation.details: Bring hotel reservation confirmation or contact details of your host in Hong Kong, including address and phone number.

sufficientFunds.title: Sufficient funds
sufficientFunds.description: Cash, credit cards, or bank statements
sufficientFunds.details: You may need to demonstrate you have enough money for your stay. Bring cash, credit cards, or recent bank statements.

healthDeclaration.title: Health declaration
healthDeclaration.description: Complete if required by current health regulations
healthDeclaration.details: Check if health declarations or COVID-related documents are needed. Complete any required forms before arrival.

info.title: Taiwan Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Entry permit required for Chinese passport holders

visa.title: ‚úì Entry Permit Policy
items: Chinese passport requires Entry Permit to Taiwan - apply online easily
‚Ä¢ Online application, about 5 business days processing
‚Ä¢ Valid for 3 months multiple entries, each stay up to 15 days
‚Ä¢ Also need to complete online arrival card before entry

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Entry Information
items: ‚Ä¢ Check permit validity: Expired or wrong dates = entry denied
‚Ä¢ Email verification required: Online card needs verification code, inaccessible email = can't complete
‚Ä¢ Complete documents preparation: Permit, return ticket, accommodation, funds proof all needed
‚Ä¢ Immigration questions detailed: May ask travel purpose, itinerary, contact info - prepare in advance
‚Ä¢ Entry permit easily lost: Paper or electronic copy must be carried, lost = big trouble

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: Reminds permit validity, auto-checks expiry
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Smart-fill online arrival card, information accurate
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Enter once, we manage permits and cards
‚Ä¢ Document checklist: Comprehensive list, no missing items

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill in what you have and complete gradually

entryPermit.title: Entry Permit
entryPermit.details: Mainland Chinese travelers must obtain Entry Permit in advance. Single-entry valid 3 months, stay up to 15 days. Ensure permit is valid.

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport valid for at least 6 months
validPassport.details: Taiwan requires passport validity of 6 months beyond entry date. Check and renew if needed.

returnTicket.title: Return or onward ticket
returnTicket.details: Provide confirmed flight booking showing you will leave Taiwan within authorized stay period.

accommodation.title: Accommodation proof
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or host contact information
accommodation.details: Provide hotel reservation confirmation or detailed contact information of friends/relatives in Taiwan, including address and phone number.

success.title: Great! You can proceed.
success.subtitle: Next we will confirm your travel information.

warning.title: Review each checklist item
warning.subtitle: Complete the prerequisites before moving on.

travelInfo.completionHint: Complete all information to submit the entry card.

info.title: Thailand Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Visa-free for 60 days for Chinese passport holders

visa.title: ‚úì Great News! Extended Visa-Free Policy
items: Since July 2024, visa-free extended to 60 days - spontaneous long trip!
‚Ä¢ No visa application needed in advance
‚Ä¢ Valid for tourism purposes
‚Ä¢ Can apply for additional 30-day extension if needed

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Entry Information
items: ‚Ä¢ Funds proof may be checked: Immigration may ask to show cash, insufficient = denied entry
‚Ä¢ Return ticket required: Must prove departure plans, no ticket = trouble
‚Ä¢ Accommodation information verifiable: May check hotel booking or host contact, unclear = questioned
‚Ä¢ TM.6 card required: Fill incorrectly = delay, prepare in advance
‚Ä¢ Customs regulations strict: E-cigarettes banned, carrying = confiscation or fine

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: Reminds 60-day limit and extension options
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Pre-fill TM.6 card, accurate information
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Enter once, track duration automatically
‚Ä¢ Communication assistant: Thai phrases prepared, immigration questions answered smoothly

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill in what you have and complete gradually

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport valid for at least 6 months
validPassport.details: Thailand requires passport validity of 6 months from entry date. Renew before travel if needed.

returnTicket.title: Return or onward ticket
returnTicket.details: Have your return flight booking or onward travel proof ready. Immigration may ask to verify your departure plans.

accommodation.title: Accommodation confirmation
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or address in Thailand
accommodation.details: Bring hotel reservation confirmation or have the address where you'll be staying, including contact phone number.

sufficientFunds.title: Sufficient funds
sufficientFunds.description: 10,000 THB per person or 20,000 THB per family
sufficientFunds.details: Proof of sufficient funds may be requested. Carry cash, show credit cards, or have bank statements available.

stayDuration.title: Stay duration limits
stayDuration.description: Maximum 30 days per visit, 90 days per 180 days
stayDuration.details: Ensure your planned stay doesn't exceed 30 days. If you've been in Thailand recently, check your cumulative stay within the past 180 days.

info.title: Japan Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Visa required in advance for Chinese passport holders

visa.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Visa Requirement
items: Chinese passport holders must obtain a visa before traveling to Japan; there is no visa waiver.
‚Ä¢ Most travelers use the short-term stay visa (tourism/business/family) for visits up to 90 days.
‚Ä¢ Apply via the Japanese Embassy/Consulate or accredited Japan Visa Application Centre before departure.
‚Ä¢ Prepare passport, itinerary, and financial proof; allow at least one week for processing.

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Entry Information
items: ‚Ä¢ Forms must be completed in black or blue ink.
‚Ä¢ Handwriting should be clear and legible.
‚Ä¢ Answer all questions truthfully on customs forms.
‚Ä¢ Keep your entry card stub until departure.
‚Ä¢ Biometric scanning (fingerprint/face) is required.

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: Auto-reminds about form completion and biometric step.
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Copy Mode ensures accurate data transfer to paper forms.
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Detailed step-by-step guide for the entire process.
‚Ä¢ Document checklist: Comprehensive preparation list for immigration/customs.

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill in what you have and complete gradually

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport valid for your intended stay
validPassport.details: Ensure passport is valid for the duration of your stay. Renew if expiry is near.

returnTicket.title: Return or onward ticket
returnTicket.description: Confirmed booking for departure from Japan
returnTicket.details: Immigration may ask to see proof of your return flight or onward journey.

accommodation.title: Accommodation proof
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or host contact information
accommodation.details: Bring hotel reservation confirmation or contact details of your host in Japan, including address and phone number.

sufficientFunds.title: Sufficient funds
sufficientFunds.description: Cash, credit cards, or bank statements
sufficientFunds.details: You may need to demonstrate you have enough money for your stay.

customsDeclaration.title: Customs Declaration
customsDeclaration.details: Be ready to declare goods, cash over ¬•1,000,000, or prohibited items.

procedures.title: Japan Entry Guide
procedures.subtitle: Visa-free for 90 days for Chinese passport holders

steps.title: Arrive at airport
steps.description: Arrive at Japanese airport immigration hall
steps.details: Prepare your passport and completed Landing Card and Customs Declaration

steps.title: Immigration control
steps.details: Submit passport and Landing Card, undergo officer inspection and fingerprint collection

steps.title: Customs declaration
steps.details: Submit Customs Declaration, declare carried items, may require baggage inspection

steps.title: Entry complete
steps.details: Get entry stamp on passport, officially enter Japan

features.title: ‚ú® What BorderBuddy can do for you

items.title: Auto-fill
items.description: We fill Landing Card and Declaration, you copy

items.title: Information entry
items.description: Enter travel info once, system auto-fills all forms

items.title: No internet needed
items.description: View forms offline, works without airport signal

items.title: Remember information
items.description: Save details, use directly next Japan visit

importantNotes.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important reminders
items: ‚Ä¢ Landing Card and Declaration must be filled with black or blue pen
‚Ä¢ Writing must be clear, information accurate
‚Ä¢ Answer yes/no questions honestly on Declaration
‚Ä¢ Be polite and cooperate with inspections
‚Ä¢ Keep your Landing Card stub until departure
